questions.question: What is the correct formula for Supreme Jasmin Green Tea(Normal Ice)?
questions.correct_answer: Sugar: 100% 60g, TeaBag: Method: 250cc + Sugar Syrup + Ice up to 900mL in Shaker
incorrect_answers: Sugar: 100% 60g, TeaBag: Method: 300cc + Sugar Syrup + Ice up to 900mL in Shaker
Sugar: 100% 68g, TeaBag: Method: 250cc + Sugar Syrup + Ice up to 900mL in Shaker
Sugar: 100% 68g, TeaBag: Method: 300cc + Sugar Syrup + Ice up to 900mL in Shaker
